Text:
Can't believe this is the season finale already! CURSE THE SHORTNESS OF BRITISH SEASONS! I'm a greedy pig and I want more.
Oh well, at least there'll be a Christmas special, and I have no doubt it'll be renewed for a fourth season.
Thanks, ez!

Thank you Ez!
Hi quality as always :-)
Many thanks -- so sad it's the end of the series, at least for now. Great quality as usual.
